category.name: Workflow
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: WRKFLW_signoff_report_show_sub_process
preference.preference_description: Controls the details of Signoff, for the parent process and sub-processes, shown in the Signoff report in the Workflow application. Valid Values: 0 - Shows signoff details for the parent process as well as dependent or independent sub-processes. 1 - Shows signoff details for the parent process and only dependent sub-processes. This is the default value.
